sections.heading: One switch does one thing (press and release)
sections.body: Call your dog over to you or show off their tricks. Make sure you keep treats to reward them!

sections.heading: What you'll need
sections.body:
You'll need to record your dogs name or commands such as "sit" onto a BIGMack talking switch.

Plug one of my switches into the BIGMack and position my switch so I can use it.
